name: Red Rock Farmer (In development)
description:
One of my best and most ambitious games, Red Rock Farmer is a role playing farming game set on mars. The game-loop is plant, sell, survive, repeat.

This is my currently working build. It was a 10 week project for my Associate's Capstone. I produced most of the art assets (time constraints), designed and programmed all UI elements, and programmed dozens of flexible scripts, including a versatile inventory system, as well as planting and harvesting by passing references.

This is still early, and the current working build. 
Just completed an overhaul of the Home Base, which is now static, and the player will have his/her own home to customize (This'll be in the next working build).

The updates I'm currently in progress on is rewriting several scripts to optimize and clean up compositions. I'll also begin to implement A* path-finding once I audit all of the code and am ready to move on.

At the encouragement of my professor, I intend to submit it for the 2019 Boston Indie Festival at MIT (BFIG).
